name: Don't look down! (mrtocsik)
description:
An army of ghosts is chasing you. All you've got is a shotgun, a grappling hook and hope. Survive as long as you can from an ever speeding ghost army by launching yourself in the air and maneuvering with your shotgun and grappling rope!

This game was made under 72 hrs for Minijam #117 Ghosts.
